flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I will guide you through the materials needed and provide examples of the techniques and materials I use. This is will provide you with a format for your own cards and hopefully act as inspiration for you to build off of for your own creations.
guide.introduction_rendered: I will guide you through the materials needed and provide examples of the techniques and materials I use. This is will provide you with a format for your own cards and hopefully act as inspiration for you to build off of for your own creations.
guide.summary: Learn how to make elegant cards of all types out of old wallpaper sample books. This is a very cost-effective and simple way to make personalized cards for every occasion.
guide.title: Wall Paper Cards
